name: Janken Hunter
description:
Time to defeat some monsters as Janken Hunter! In order to bet the vicious monsters, you will be using your skills from an old time classic game that is Rock-Paper-Scissors. Rock- Paper- Scissors is a well-known game that is played worldwide by people of all ages.

How many monsters can you take down?

Features:
- Classic style pixel art
- Upbeat fighting music
- Non-stop challenging levels
- Rewards given on various levels
- It’s FREE Download!

Feedback: contact@motigames.com
More information: www.motigames.com
